resources.string: Installments are a way to spread a large transaction out over multiple days and are meant to be used for e.g. rent, a new TV, etc. The installments are paid off every day until the whole transaction is done. Longpress an installment to delete it.
Events are used to group categories together for a specific event e.g. trips or vacation. When events are active, all made transactions will be linked to them.
Press the button to create a new currency. Tap a currency to set it as the active one. Longpress a currency to edit or delete it.
Mnemosyne was the personification of memory in Greek mythology. A Titanide, or Titaness, she was the daughter of Uranus and Gaia, and the mother of the nine Muses by Zeus.

3.4:
 - Backup of database with Google Cloud Backup
 - Categories can now be sorted
 - Fixed bug where multiple daily incomes would be added for some users
 3.3.1:
 - Fixed bug where app would not start for some users
 3.3:
 - Events. Log transactions under one or more events to keep track of costs for e.g. trips.
 - Improved currency functionality. Currencies can now be saved and easier switched between as well as used on the fly.
 - Fixed bug in long pressing of prices
